subject: Draft and Recruitment (Military)
Vietnam War
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A 1967 radio interview of Muhammad Ali’s explaining his refusal to be drafted into the Army and go to Vietnam evoked memories of the profound impact his decision had, and the high price he paid.
snippet: A 1967 radio interview of Muhammad Ali’s explaining his refusal to be drafted into the Army and go to Vietnam evoked memories of the profound impact his decision had, and the high price he paid.
